Definition.Description: Notifications Create email notifications to inform about specific machine downtimes or failure types. Information is shared automatically with those who need it when they need it. Resulting in faster response times and increased uptime. Auto-update Organizer reports and send a pdf compy to recipients on a schedule (daily, monthly, etc.)
Definition.Document:
Extensibility and Add-Ons

Notifications

Create email notifications to inform about specific machine downtimes or failure types. Information is shared automatically with those who need it when they need it. Resulting in faster response times and increased uptime.

Auto-update Organizer reports and send a pdf compy to recipients on a schedule (daily, monthly, etc.)

Data Exports

The condition export option will deliver a grid of data with a row for each capsule in the condition. 

Basic Capsule information and Capsule Properties are included in the export

This can be exported for use in a Third Party Platform, for example, Power-Bi.

Example Condition Export

Example Power Bi Dashboard

OEE dashboard on Power BI
